0932A9FD.Line13.7FA05: And you know this...how? Did you and Lorath discover something of interest?

27464250.VoiceDir19.7FA05: hesitant, trying to play it down

2810B8F0.Line7.7FA05: Well, there’s a name from another life.

3D1B9D01.Line17.7FA05: (clears throat) Yes, I was just getting to that.

47C1DA3D.Line31.7FA05: Stay close to the other Knights Penitent.

5968D5CA.VoiceDir13.7FA05: intrigued but cagey, trying not to sound too eager

5B80055C.Line21.7FA05: Probably best if we discuss it there.

608DBF14.Line11.BAE4: With a warning: an ancient evil walks the land. The demon, Lilith.

8D51C8CE.VoiceDir17.7FA05: not angry or rude, more disappointed - Clears his throat before the line

8F68F860.Line25.7FA05: (sigh) Get to Braestaig. And be careful.

A31AE691.Line15.804B7: Perhaps this is all connected to what you saw, father.

C2053272.Line9.7FA05: Hm, has the old man finally come down from the mountain?

C351EB64.Line29.7FA05: Go and have a look around for yourself. I’ll meet you shortly, and then we can talk more.

D7101683.Line19.7FA05: There was an incident at my estate.

DD9C3BA7.Line5.BAE4: I have a message from Lorath.

DF9F242D.VoiceDir25.7FA05: fatherly, concerned - Deep breath before the line

F351125E.VoiceDir15.804B7: to Donan, trying to be helpful
